name: Warframe
description: This installer is Esync and DXVK ready.
notes:
This runner has been built with Faudio and ffmpeg enabled. This is necessary in order for the game to run properly. 

**IMPORTANT, PLEASE NOTE**

This game uses a custom, script-based launcher in place of the official launcher in order to update the game.


For issues regarding installation, feel free to join my (GloriousEggroll)'s discord. We h ave many users using a variety of methods to play the game including my launcher and a custom proton version for steam:

https://discord.gg/6y3BdzC

**************************

There is no discord integration because in order to do so would be against the Warframe TOS:

https://forums.warframe.com/topic/1003139-simple-question-regarding-discord-rpcdll-for-devs/
content:
files:
- launcherlinux: https://gitlab.com/GloriousEggroll/warframe-linux/-/archive/master/warframe-linux-master.zip
game:
  arch: win64
  exe:  $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Warframe/Warframe-Launcher.bat
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Warframe
    src: launcherlinux
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Warframe
    file: launcherlinux
    nomerge: true
- execute:
    command: mv "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\ Files/Warframe/warframe-linux-master/*
      "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\ Files/Warframe/
- execute:
    command: rm -R "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\ Files/Warframe/warframe-linux-master/
- execute:
    command: mkdir -p "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\ Files/Warframe/Downloaded/Public/
      && cp "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\ Files/Warframe/Warframe.x64.dxvk-cache "$GAMEDIR"/drive_c/Program\
      Files/Warframe/Downloaded/Public/
system:
  env:
    PBA_DISABLE: 0
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_THREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS: 1
    mesa_glthread: 'true'
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  dxvk: true
  dxvk_version: 1.1.1
  esync: true
  version: ge-faudio-protonified-4.8-x86_64
